entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS simulator does not launch #25301
  • CollectionView scrolling properties #25292
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #25290
  • net8.0-android34.0 - Deployment failed on Android device with error XABLD7023: Could not find a part of the path #25285
  • Inconsistent HapticFeedback on iOS #25284
  • Images, loaded from stream, are not displayed in Release mode on Android using .NET 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.12 version #25283
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Issue with TouchBehavior Background Color Remaining After Navigation in .NET MAUI (iOS 18) #25280
  • Application.Current.Windows clears #25274
  • RadioButtonGroup/RadioButton throw CGContextSetLineWidth error on iOS 18.0/18.1. #25273

Closed

  • Rendering issue in WinUI when setting Label.FormattedText #24516
    Backlog
  • VisualState Setters not working properly on Windows for a CollectionView #22104
    Backlog
  • XAML Page Binding to Self Gets Incorrect Warning #25271
  • TemplatedView and TemplateBinding not working anymore in NET9 #24949
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • XAML Object Self Reference Gets Warning #25272
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Cant display an Entry : The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #25277
  • Unable to run\Debug MAUI Application with net 8 #24868
  • NullReferenceException when setting BarBackgroundColor for a NavigationPage #25114
    .NET 8 SR10
  • clean suceeded, build failed #25261
    Backlog
  • Setting NavigationPage.HasNavigationBar="False" on modally presented NavigationPage causes top padding on iOS #24972
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update bug-report.yml with .NET 8 SR 9.2 #25305
  • Initialize ResourceDictionaryHelpers.SetAndLoadSource when XAML Hot Reload is enabled #25304
  • Update templates for non-VS IDE hosts #25303
    community ✨
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241015205147081 to net9.0 #25302
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241015192031750 to net9.0 #25299
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Report XC0025 as an error only in strict compilation mode #25298
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] disable AOT warning on InitComp #25297
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25296
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25295
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Backport WinAppSDK 1.6 bump to NET9 release #25294
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [ci] Try skip install android stuff on handlers build #25293
  • Avoid bubbling up invalidation event on new layouts #25291
    community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25289
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25287
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #25286
  • [Testing] Implement WaitForFirstElement method to UITest extension methods #25282
    area-testing
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update to rtm and arcade net9 #25279
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Move current Bugzilla HostApp pages to subfolder #25278
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix for the issue with Label text color when resetting from FormattedText. #25119
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Windows] Fixed VisualState Update for CollectionView SelectedItem #25145
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [XC] Report XC0025 as an error only in strict compilation mode #25082
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [XC] disable AOT warning on InitComp #25276
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25152
  • [Housekeeping] TestCases.HostApp project project cleanup #25281
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [nuget-msi-convert] Support improved VS component IDs #25275
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25184
  • NullReferenceException when setting BarBackgroundColor for a NavigationPage - fix #25197
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, potential-regression
  • [XC] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25183
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Try build arcade net9 #25085
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Support improved VS component IDs #25205
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix tsa file not found #25255
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #25254
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Move from term "laid out" to "arranged" #25250
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • Debug slow controls device tests #25096
    do-not-merge
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR10
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25173
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 #25252
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    area-blazor
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator improvements - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • [Documentation] Fix TitleBar comment mistake #25243
    area-docs
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
